ygData.subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Digest Number 257
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Necromancers can also charm spectres, and chain pull. They also have the advantage of feign death, which is kind of nice.. But, if there are a bunch of
ygData.messageBody:
> And really... what other class can make a pet that
> hits for over 100? well,
> bard I guess but I wouldnt want to be near THAT.


Necromancers can also charm spectres, and chain pull.
They also have the advantage of feign death, which is
kind of nice.. But, if there are a bunch of soloers on
spectres, I just switch to DWGs =)
